verbs.description: [ARG0: Former National Security Agency analyst John Schindler] [V: revealed] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARG1: that American intelligence agencies have a lot more information connecting President Donald Trump to the Kremlin than they ’ve let on so far] , [ARGM-ADV: claiming that Trump was considered a " Russian agent " by the US intelligence community before the 2016 election] .
